Hi, my name is Nataly Carbonell. I graduated from the University of Florida with a bachelor's degree in Computer Science and a certificate in Engineering Innovation. Currently, I work as a Software Engineer at MongoDB in nyc.

In my free time, I like to juggle with my soccer ball ⚽️, workout 🏋🏻‍♀️, read 📖, and make music playlists 🎶 (follow me on Spotify!)
